column1: Она пошла в театр с Джоном
column2: She went to the theater with John.
She bought a car from Mike.
She isn't ashamed of her past.
Did you sleep well last night?

column1: Я вчера поговорил с Джоном о его работе
column2: I talked to John about his job yesterday.

column1: Они не обратили внимание на это
column2: They didn't pay attention to it.

column1: Они работали над этой презентацией всю ночь
column2: They worked on this presentation all night.
When did they come up with this plan?
He should look for a job.

column1: Они провели 20 минут там и ушли
column2: They spent 20 minutes there and left.
It took a lot of time.
Where did you find that job?
She should complain to the manager.

column1: Он умный но он не учится достаточно
column2: He is smart but he doesn't study enough.
